com.worksap.nlp.sudachi

クラス EditConnectionCostPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.worksap.nlp.sudachi.EditConnectionCostPlugin

  • public abstract class EditConnectionCostPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
    A plugin for editing the connection costs.

    Dictionary initialize this plugin with Settings. It can be referred as Plugin.settings.

    The following is an example of settings. 

    
   {
     "class" : "com.worksap.nlp.sudachi.SampleEditConnectionPlugin",
     "example" : "example setting"
   }

    • メソッドの詳細

      • setUp

        public void setUp(Grammar grammar)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Set up the plugin. Tokenizer calls this method for setting up this plugin.
        パラメータ:
        grammar - the grammar of the system dictionary
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if reading something is failed

      • edit

        public abstract void edit(Grammar grammar)
        Edit the connection costs. To edit connection costs, you can use Grammar#getConnectCost, Grammar#setConnectCost, and inhibitConnection.
        パラメータ:
        grammar - the grammar of the system dictionary

      • inhibitConnection

        public void inhibitConnection(Grammar grammar,
                              short leftId,
                              short rightId)
        Inhibit a connection.
        パラメータ:
        grammar - the grammar of the system dictionary
        leftId - the left-ID of the connection
        rightId - the right-ID of the connection
